title: Result
description: Represents the result of running CFLint

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of CFLint that products these results

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: A timestamp representing the Unix epoch time when these results were generated

issues.title: Issues
issues.description: A list of issues reported by CFLint

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: The severity level of the issue

id.title: ID
id.description: Unique identifier of the rule used to find the issue

abbrev.title: Abbreviation
abbrev.description: An abbreviation of the rule used to find the issue

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: A list of locations that the issue occurs

items.title: Location
items.description: Properties of the individual issue reported

file.title: File
file.description: Full file path to the file in which the issue was found

fileName.title: File name
fileName.description: Just the file name in which the issue was found

function.title: Function
function.description: The function in which or for which the issue was found

column.title: Column
column.description: The column number of the starting position at which the issue was found

line.title: Line
line.description: The line number of the starting position at which the issue was found

message.title: Message
message.description: A message describing this specific issue

variable.title: Variable
variable.description: The variable name for which the issue was found

expression.title: Expression
expression.description: The expression in which the issue was found

counts.title: Counts
counts.description: Provides counts for the results of running CFLint

totalFiles.title: Total Files
totalFiles.description: The total number of files read during this scan

totalLines.title: Total Lines
totalLines.description: The total number of lines of code scanned

countByCode.title: Count by Code
countByCode.description: List of issue codes with their respective issue counts

items.title: Code Count
items.description: The count of issues found for each distinct issue code

code.title: Current Code
code.description: The current issue code being counted

count.title: Current Count
count.description: The issue count for the current issue code

countBySeverity.title: Count by Severity
countBySeverity.description: List of issue severities with their respective issue counts

items.title: Severity Count
items.description: The count of issues found for each distinct issue severity

severity.title: Current Severity
severity.description: The current issue severity being counted

count.title: Current Count
count.description: The issue count for the current severity
